Snow Crash

11 February 2006

Rating: 5 of 5

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5

ISBN: 0553562614

Tonight I finished up the last few pages of the book that I've been reading over the past few weeks. The book is called 'Snow Crash' and is written by Neal Stephenson.

I won't try to give my literary interpretation of the book, but I can provide references to reviews that I think are good and others that I agree with.

  • Slashdot Book Review: Snow Crash
  • The Complete Review: Snow Crash
  • Book Review of Snow Crash
  • LookSmart: Snow Crash book reviews
